text: 33|23|satyavisvasikalute kuttattil cila purusanmarunt‌. etearu karyattil allahuveat avar utampati ceytuvea, atil avar satyasandhata pulartti. annane avaril cilar (rakta saksitvattilute) tannalute pratijna niraverri. avaril cilar (at‌) kattirikkunnu. avar (utampatikk‌) yatearu vidha marravum varuttiyittilla
